title: Journalistic Event
description: Represents a discrete, real-world occurrence with factual details.

eventId.description: A unique identifier for the event.

title.description: A concise, descriptive title of the event (e.g., 'Fire at City Hall', 'Treaty Signing').

timestamp.description: The exact date and time of the event.

location.description: The physical location where the event took place.

actors.description: A list of people, organizations, or agencies involved in the event.

actorId.description: The unique ID of the actor (person, company, agency, etc.).

roleInEvent.description: The actor's specific role in this event (e.g., 'witness', 'suspect', 'spokesperson').

description.description: A factual summary of what happened during the event.

outcomes.description: A list of immediate or significant outcomes of the event.

sources.description: A list of verifiable sources or evidence for the event.
